title: Small Number 7 Pinata for Kids 7th Birthday Party Decorations, Centerpieces, Favors, Gradient Pink and Gold Foil, Easy to Fill, Top Loop for Easy Hanging (11.7x10 in)
features: 7 Year Old Girl Birthday Decorations: Impress your guests with a festive theme and fun party game at an upcoming kid's birthday party with this pink number 7 pinata
Easy To Fill: You can easily fill the pink pinata with fun and festive items such as small toys, candy, chocolate, or confetti via the easy-to-cut label on the top (fillers not included)
Cute and Durable: The interior of the small pinata is made of corrugated paper, while the exterior is decorated with pink and gold foil paper in varying shades of pink
The Perfect Size: The kid's birthday pinata measures approximately 11.7x10 inches; perfectly sized to hang from a tree, railing, or ladder, or sit on a dinner or dessert table
Package Contents: You will receive 1 number 7 pinata with a loop on the top for easy hanging and an easy-to-cut hole so you can fill it with candy and pinata filler (not included)
description: Add a fun and festive touch to your next celebration with our pink and gold foil number 7 pinata. Whether you're celebrating a child's 7th birthday or a milestone anniversary, this pinata is the perfect addition to your 7th birthday decorations for girls. Measuring 11.7x10 inches, this small pinata is the perfect size for hanging from a ladder, roof, railing, or tree. Simply use the included rope to hang it up and let the fun begin. Children and adults of all ages will love taking turns trying to break open the pinata to reveal the hidden treats inside, such as toys, chocolates, or confetti. The pink and gold foil tissue paper design adds an extra touch of style to your party decorations, making it a great addition to any 7 year old birthday celebration for girls. It's also versatile enough to use as a table centerpiece for an upcoming anniversary celebration. Overall, this number 7 pinata is a fun and interactive party game that is sure to be a hit with guests of all ages. So add it to your party supplies today and get ready for a fun-filled celebration!
